title: Game not starting
body: After the game is done loading and everyone is at 100% the game doesn't start then its crashes and when i try to reconnect at a certain percent it stops loading again and crashes.Also if the game knows i'm crashing i shouldn't be put in lower priority queue for it.Also sometimes the game starts before someone is done loading i have seen this happen to other people as well

replies.body:
It certainly sounds like your client is having a hard time connecting to the game servers intermittently. The server has no way of determining why you've disconnected, as it simply sees a disconnection, which means your client stops communicating with the server entirely.

Most of these issues are caused by local network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are good. Let me know the results of those steps.
